mapper.select: select u.user_number, u.user_nickname, n.notice_number, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_date, n.notice_count from tbl_user u join tbl_notice n on u.user_number = n.user_number

select u.user_number, u.user_Email, n.notice_number , n.notice_title , n.notice_content , n.notice_date , n.notice_count from tbl_user u join tbl_notice n on u.user_number = n.notice_number order by notice_number desc limit #{startRow}, 10

SELECT u.user_number, u.user_nickname, n.notice_number, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_date, n.notice_count FROM tbl_user u INNER JOIN tbl_notice n ON u.user_number = n.user_number WHERE n.notice_number = #{noticeNumber};
